snippet: To hundreds of players in English soccer over the past 20 years, Charles Porter and his staff have been indispensable in providing the Premier League lifestyle....
abstract: Profile of Charles Porter, networker of sorts who has been integral in providing players in English soccer with Premier League lifestyle; Porter's company arranges everything from cell phones and cars to banking and real estate services for players and their families.
lead_paragraph: To hundreds of players in English soccer over the past 20 years, Charles Porter and his staff have been indispensable in providing the Premier League lifestyle.

headline.main: Premier League Stars Score the Goals. He Scores Everything Else.
headline.print_headline: Need a Phone? Car? Santa? Done. Discreetly.
